name: Vertical Snow Dodge
description:
(THE GAME IS KIND OF PLAYABLE IN MOBILE DEVICES, BUT IT IS RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IT ON A COMPUTER).

"Vertical Snow Dodge" is a game coded in my own javascript framework. In the game, you are an ice cube, and you have to dodge snowballs coming at you from the right side of the screen.

Art, music and programming by JMIDEV ©.
